author: crossley
msg: With the "Other Versions" tab, the menu was including other items from the
Welcome and Project tabs. Referring the Overview item to versions/docs.html
fixes that, probably due to the prior change to tabs.xml for dir="versions".

author: crossley
msg: The sub-tabs for other versions were showing on the "Welcome" tab,
whereas we only want them on the "Other Versions" tab.
Adding a directory "versions" and setting the @dir attribute
to refer to "versions" rather than "" made the sub-tabs relate to

author: crossley
msg: Make the Howto tab be selected by pointing to docs_0_70/howto
